Question: Ruth needed a new notebook, so she looked for a store that sold _______.

Mom, Johnny’s mother doesn’t have enough chairs for her dinner guests. She wants to borrow one of _______.

_______ many desirable qualities which make it a commercially very useful metal.

Response_Option: Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine
Option1: Never in my wildest dreams did I imagine

Option3: I did never imagine in my wildest dreams

Question: Some of Curt Wilder’s books have been widely read ______ others have remained relatively unknown.
